extendedInfo.description: Smoking is a learned habit that you have practiced long and well. Quitting means you un-learn that habit, substitute healthy alternatives, and reap the rewards of a smoke-free life.

reviews.title: Good idea, but buggy
reviews.comment: This app is set up for the way I would like to quit--slowly, with a gradual nicotine withdraw, and that I love. But it crashes and has to restart every time I open it, and then it\'s slow to register my commands. Please fix!
reviews.author: Leigha Shea

reviews.title: Uninstalled regrettably
reviews.comment: This is the type of app I was looking for - something that will step you down off dependence. Unfortunately, the app never starts correctly, always needing a restart; won\'t keep you logged in; loses track of daily counts; clunky interface that requires several steps to input cigarette times. Excellent idea for an app, but really bad execution.
reviews.author: Kathy Lundgren
